SEARCH
Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.cli

Class ViewHub

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.cli.ViewHub
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ViewHub extends Object implements Runnable
The ViewHub class manages the various stages and views in the CLI application. It handles rendering to the screen, managing notifications, popups, and the main command line interface.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ViewHub()
    Constructs a ViewHub object, initializes the screen, and sets up the initial view.
